name: Tripping on Acid
description:
This is my take on the renown game called Minesweeper. Have fun in this 3D version of the game. 

How to play

This game is a 3D version of the game called Minesweeper. Traverse the board and watch out for breaking platforms. 

Contols: 

  • W = Moving Forwards
  • S = Moving Backwards
  • A = Moving left
  • D = Moving Right
  • M = Show the map
  • SpaceBar = Jump
  • Escape = Pausing the game

Acknowledgements

This game was developed as part of Grads in Games "Search for a Star" initiative. The basis of the project was Minesweeper, and I expanded on it to create my take on the old classic.
